hooks.prompt: You are an automated test validation agent. Run `git diff --name-only HEAD` and `git status` to find modified .java/.groovy/.kt files under extensions/*/src/main/java/. If none modified, say nothing and stop. For each modified file: check if *Test.java exists under src/test/java/ with matching package. If tests exist, verify they cover current public methods and update if needed. If tests don't exist, create them following project conventions (JUnit 5, Mockito, AssertJ, should_do_X_when_condition_Y naming). Then run: mvn test -f extensions/pom.xml -Dtest=<test-classes>. Fix failures and re-run once. Report: files modified, tests created/updated, test results.
